resources.string: Take a picture of the last bricks you put in the bag
Share2Pley has started with the thought of toys being accessible for everyone. Sharing toys is not only durable, but can be a financial solution for many families too.
Sharing toys and optimal apply, at Share2Pley we encourage the sharing economy. Instead of buying toys each time, we share toys. Hereby we use toys optimal. Who does\'nt want new toys every time?

Sixteen different packages with LEGO速. For boys, girls and of course for everyone. From ages 3 to 99. What can be more fun than playing together?
You don't have to take toys with you! No more worries about packing, cleaning or losing!
Our toys are checked, complete and 100% clean. And a nice way to learn new toys!
From clicks to bricks, for many children playing online is more accessible than physical play. Choosing what and when to play by yourself. Combine with Share2Pley 2 different worlds: every time different kind of toys during your holiday.
Now disassemble all the other pieces and put them in the bag as well.
